law.catch_line: Five members of the Authority are a quorum....

section.section: Five members of the Authority are a quorum.
An affirmative vote of at least four members is needed for the Authority to act.

text.section: The Authority shall determine the times and places of its meetings.

A member of the Authority:
is not entitled to compensation as a member of the Authority; but
is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.
